channel.title: 'Growth Hacking' Handbook
channel.description:
A friend of my is crowdsourcing a book on 'Growth Hacking'. Whilst I prefer the archaic term 'marketing' he's also selling to the startup world, where a little buzzword bingo has to help with sales!
https://publishizer.com/growth-hacking-handbook/
I've seen the original presentation (live!) that the book will be based on and if that's anything to go by the book is going to be very 'tactical' - i.e. useful. If you're interested, it's certainly worth $25.

item.title: 'Growth Hacking' Handbook
item.dc:creator: andycroll
item.description:
A friend of my is crowdsourcing a book on ‘Growth Hacking’. Whilst I prefer the archaic term ‘marketing’ he’s also selling to the startup world, where a little buzzword bingo has to help with sales!

Publishizer

Growth Hacking Handbook by Jon Yongfook

Test. Evaluate. Repeat. Today's companies use an array of online marketing tactics to grow. This book gives you 100 tactics.

I’ve seen the original presentation (live!) that the book will be based on and if that’s anything to go by the book is going to be very ‘tactical’ - i.e. useful. If you’re interested, it’s certainly worth $25.

Read full topic
